thread.title: McGaw Graphics Releases 2016 Art Catalogue
thread.title_full: McGaw Graphics Releases 2016 Art Catalogue - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: McGaw Graphics Releases 2016 Art Catalogue
text:
Leading art publisher McGaw Graphics has released a new hardcover catalogue, which includes new and top-selling images from the last four decades.
Sunderland, VT (PRWEB) October 15, 2015
For nearly 40 years McGaw Graphics has brought the finest images from museums and galleries into homes and businesses worldwide with their high quality fine art prints. At nearly 300 pages, the hardcover 2016 Art Catalogue provides imagery from museum and contemporary masters artists including new posters by Andy Warhol, Henri Matisse, Mark Rothko, Richard Diebenkorn, Jackson Pollock, and Wayne Thiebaud. McGaw’s rich history as the pre-eminent worldwide publisher includes a comprehensive selection of artwork from contemporary artists such as Romero Britto, Alice Dalton Brown & Zhen-Huan Lu, along with exciting images by rising contemporary artists Casey Matthews, Erin Hanson, Jennifer Lommers, Jessica Durrant, Loui Jover, and Margaret Juul.
“McGaw’s Catalog has been the industry standard for almost 40 years in the art publishing world and the 2016 edition carries on that legacy,” said George Yedinak, Chief Executive Officer of McGaw Graphics. “Even in today’s digital age, the value of having a sophisticated, printed catalog is important for our business partners and our clients that want to spend time choosing art for their spaces where they work and live.”
The new catalogue opens with over 100 pages of top-selling posters from McGaw’s Museum & Masters collection and expands to 8 other classic categories providing a breadth of open edition prints.
All images are offered in a range of sizes, from small format to oversize. Most images are also offered in alternate sized prints on poster paper, giclée paper and canvas. For more information or to order a 2016 Art catalogue, please visit http://www.mcgawgraphics.com .
About McGaw Graphics
Located in the heart of the Green Mountains of Vermont, McGaw Graphics is a leading art publishing company, providing high-quality art prints from over 200 artists, and more than 10,000 images. McGaw Graphics offers the most comprehensive museum collection with artists like Monet, Van Gogh, Degas and more modern masters such as Andy Warhol, Keith Haring and Mark Rothko, as well as various contemporary artists. McGaw Graphics posters are printed in the United States and sold worldwide.
